email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Sophia,

I hope you're doing well. We are looking to charter a vessel for a shipment of 12,000 MT of coal from Newcastle to Shanghai under CIF terms. Could you please provide a suitable vessel and a freight quote?

Best regards,
Liam Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Liam,

Thank you for your inquiry. I can offer the vessel SEA HORIZON, which has a DWT of 45,000 and an LOA of 190m. The freight rate is USD 35/MT. The laycan is 15-20 November 2023. Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Sophia Martinez

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Sophia,

Thanks for the quick response. USD 35/MT seems a bit high. Could you provide more details on the vessel's specifications and the demurrage rate? Also, is there any flexibility in the laycan dates?

Best regards,
Liam Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai - Additional Details
email_chain.body:
Liam,

The SEA HORIZON is equipped with gear and has a speed of 14 knots. The demurrage rate is USD 12,000 per day. Considering your concerns, I can adjust the laycan to 18-23 November and reduce the freight rate to USD 33/MT. Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Sophia Martinez

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai - Additional Details
email_chain.body:
Sophia,

Thank you for the updated details. USD 33/MT is more reasonable. We can proceed with the laycan of 18-23 November. Please send over the recap for confirmation.

Best regards,
Liam Carter

email_chain.subject: Confirmed: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Liam,

Great! Here is the recap for your records:

Commodity: Coal
Quantity: 12,000 MT
Load Port: Newcastle
Discharge Port: Shanghai
Incoterms: CIF
Vessel: SEA HORIZON
Freight: USD 33/MT
Laycan: 18-23 November 2023
Demurrage: USD 12,000/day

Thanks for the business!

Best regards,
Sophia Martinez
